name: .000 Practice Tree
description:
.000 Practice Tree is a customizable Drag Racing Practice Tree on your iPhone or IPad! Whether you are a sportsman racer, professional racer, or just a drag racing fan wanting to improve your reaction times this app can help you.

• Features
- Practice your reaction times on a .5 Pro Tree, .4 Pro Tree, .5 Full Tree, or a Instant Green Tree
- Race Against Friends with the Local Multiplayer mode
- Fully Customizable Roll Out's, Delay's, and Dial In's
- LED and Incandescent Light Style's
- Statistics Page where you can see stats about your performance
- Pro Motion Support for supported devices

• How To Practice
- Simply hold down the stage button and let go to get your reaction time
- Customize the practice tree to your liking by using the sliders or clicking on the numbers



• Support
- Need Support? Feature Request? Ask on Twitter @PracticeTree or email 000practicetree@gmail.com
